mapper.select: SELECT u.id AS pubId , u.name , CASE WHEN s.pub_id IS NULL THEN 'N' ELSE 'Y' END as subYn FROM user u LEFT JOIN( SELECT s2.pub_id FROM subscribe s2 WHERE s2.user_id = #{id} AND s2.valid_yn = 'Y' ) s ON u.id = s.pub_id WHERE u.id IN (SELECT a.id FROM auth a WHERE a.auth = 'ROLE_CEL')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO subscribe (user_id, pub_id, start_date, end_date, valid_yn, times) VALUES (#{userId}, #{pubId}, now(), DATE_ADD(now(), INTERVAL 1 MONTH), 'Y', 1)
